query:
SELECT 
  'Relatórios Livres' as tipo,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  DATE_FORMAT(MIN(dataVisita), '%Y-%m-%d') as primeira_data,
  DATE_FORMAT(MAX(dataVisita), '%Y-%m-%d') as ultima_data
FROM relatorios_livres 
WHERE YEAR(dataVisita) = 2025 AND MONTH(dataVisita) = 12
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Relatórios Completos' as tipo,
  COUNT(*) as total,
  DATE_FORMAT(MIN(dataVisita), '%Y-%m-%d') as primeira_data,
  DATE_FORMAT(MAX(dataVisita), '%Y-%m-%d') as ultima_data
FROM relatorios_completos 
WHERE YEAR(dataVisita) = 2025 AND MONTH(dataVisita) = 12;
